short_summary: Procurement for 1 (one) dual-motor variant speed pedestal buffing lathe for the Electroplating - Work Centre
description: Procurement for 1 (one) dual-motor variant speed pedestal buffing lathe for the Electroplating - Work Centre at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON. Tentative for the Electroplating group a Dual Motor Variable Speed Pedastal Buffing Lathe to Polish / Debuff Metal Components.
